original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close steady, rupee 312.50/313.50 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds were steady at close, dealers said while the spot US dollar closed at 312.50/313.50 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.50/80 percent steady from 14.50/15.10 percent from the previous close.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 14.50/15.00 percent which remained unchanged from opening on Monday.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 14.00/15.00 steady from 14.25/15.50 percent from opening. (Colombo/ July10/2023)
